publicationStmt.p: Calender page from Mary Behrend, was never a published item.

sourceDesc.p: Mary Behrend drew on her calender pages and added a small note, with each page. Each page is from the year 1909

body.p: COPYRIGHT 1908, BY FRIENDSHIP CALENDER CO. NEW BRITAIN, CONN.

figure.head: Molly on Snowshoes
figure.p: A girl dressed in winter weather clothing is drawn on the left side of the paper. She is wearing two huge snowshoes. These snowshoes have red dots around the edges.

body.p: MoLLY ON SnoWSHoES THAT MR, WEir GoT. PRETTY PicTURE IS iT NOT?!
